description: The guys in the house are always hungry for pizza and cock. Gavin Waters and Phenix Saint order pizza and fight over who has the bigger slice while Brandon Lewis and Kennedy Carter feed on each other's big cocks in the game room. When Gavin and Phenix walk in on them all hell breaks loose! The three older guys take turns fucking Kennedy's young face then all four of them pile on the ping-pong table for an intense double-reverse-cowboy fuck-down. Somebody tell Gavin and Brandon that sitting on it doesn't make you a top!
title: The Dude Show 2, Scene #03
